review: I'll start out by saying that the primary reason for the low score is because there's no Vudu app available, and the only way to get access to your ultraviolet collection is through the horribly flawed flixster app, which doesn't play your videos in HD, and doesn't allow you to play TV episodes.I bought the unit under the assumption that an android based player would have a basic app like Vudu available to it, but I was wrong.  I've already got many movies and tv shows in my ultraviolet locker, and I have no plans on buying them again from Amazon digital.If you already have an ultraviolet library, get a Roku.  If you have Prime and/or a collection of Amazon videos, still get a Roku, as Roku also has the amazon app, and gives you a much nicer, cleaner, interface.
